action.createMindMapInsertToMd: Create Mind Map and Insert into Current Document
action.insertCodeBlockToMd: Insert Mind Map Code Block into Current Document

tip.fileIsNotMd: Current file is not a Markdown document
tip.onlyEnableSelectCurrentVaultFile: Only files from the current vault can be added
tip.integerInputError: Please enter a number greater than 0

theme.title: Default theme (light color)
theme.desc: Default theme for creating a mind map file in light color mode
theme.desc2: Default theme for creating a mind map file in dark mode

layout.title: Default Layout
layout.desc: The default structure when creating a new mind map file

folder.desc4: Storage location for newly created SimpleMindMap files
folder.desc1: Custom file storage directory, relative to vault root directory
folder.desc5: Storage location for uploaded image files (node images, background images)
folder.desc2: Custom image storage directory, relative to vault root directory
folder.desc6: Custom subfolder, relative to current file's folder
folder.desc7: Storage directory for local files selected in node hyperlinks
folder.desc3: Custom file storage directory, relative to vault root directory
folder.option4: Specified subfolder under current file's folder

compress.desc1: Whether to compress uploaded node images (locally selected images)
compress.desc2: Set the maximum width after image compression
compress.desc3: Set the maximum height after image compression
compress.desc4: The quality of compressed images is only valid for certain image formats, such as jpg

codeBlock.title: Code Block Initial Height
codeBlock.desc: Initial height when embedding via smm code block (pixels)

embed.title1: Embed Preview Double Click to Open a New Window
embed.desc1: When embedding an MD document in format ![[]], double-click to preview the image and open the file in a new window
embed.desc2: Set whether the background of the embedded preview image is transparent

file.title1: New Mind Map File Name Prefix
file.desc1: Default naming format for new mind map files: Prefix + Space + Date Timestamp
file.title2: Date Timestamp Format for New Mind Map Files
file.desc2: Default format: YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm.ss, Example: 2025-01-01 23.59.59. For details on format meaning and modification, refer to: https://day.js.org/docs/en/parse/string-format
